snippet: David Krejci scored his third goal in overtime to secure Boston’s victory, and Matt Read scored twice in Philadelphia’s win.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins defeat New Jersey Devils, 4-3; other hockey results noted.
lead_paragraph: David Krejci scored his third goal in overtime to secure Boston’s victory, and Matt Read scored twice in Philadelphia’s win.

headline.seo: Bruins Top Devils on David Krejci’s Hat Trick
headline.main: Bruins Top Devils on Hat Trick by Krejci; Flyers Beat Islanders
headline.print_headline: Bruins Top Devils on Hat Trick by Krejci; Flyers Beat Islanders
